moves.2... d5 3. Nf3 e6: Not too bad. Some like Bf5. I can do both.
moves.4. Nbd2 Bd6 5. Ne5: Bringing his horse to a fairly goo place.
moves.7. c3 Qe7 8. e3: To get his Bishop out, I think.
moves.9... Ne4 10. dxc5 Ndxc5: The best piece to take it with, in my opinion.
moves.11. Qc2 Nf6 12. O-O-O: Now, he will attack on the kingside, I, on the queenside.
moves.14... Bb7 15. Nd2 Rfc8: Get my rooks in the game is best.
moves.17. g5 Nfe4 18. Nxe4 Nxe4 19. g6: !? He should attack my king, but also guard his, too!
moves.19... bxc3 20. gxf7+ Kf8: !!. Probably does not deserve "!!" but if Kh8?? Ng6+! Mating!!
moves.24. Qxb2 cxb2+ 25. Kxb2 Qb4 26. Rh4 Qc3+: He resigned here. Amazingly it took us 1 day to play the full game!
